failed_checks.check_name: Ensure CloudWatch log groups retains logs for at least 1 year
Ensure that CloudWatch Log Group is encrypted by KMS
Ensure Terraform module sources use a commit hash
code_block:
module "s3_bucket" {
  source  = "terraform-aws-modules/s3-bucket/aws"
  version = "~> 5.0"

  bucket_prefix = "${local.name}-"
  force_destroy = true

  # Policy works for flow logs as well
  attach_waf_log_delivery_policy = true

  tags = local.tags
}

Ensure CloudWatch log groups retains logs for at least 1 year
Ensure CloudWatch log groups retains logs for at least 1 year
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource
Ensure that Security Groups are attached to another resource
Ensure VPC flow logging is enabled in all VPCs
code_block:
resource "aws_vpc" "this" {
  count = local.create_vpc ? 1 : 0

  region = var.region

  cidr_block          = var.use_ipam_pool ? null : var.cidr
  ipv4_ipam_pool_id   = var.ipv4_ipam_pool_id
  ipv4_netmask_length = var.ipv4_netmask_length

  assign_generated_ipv6_cidr_block     = var.enable_ipv6 && !var.use_ipam_pool ? true : null
  ipv6_cidr_block                      = var.ipv6_cidr
  ipv6_ipam_pool_id                    = var.ipv6_ipam_pool_id
  ipv6_netmask_length                  = var.ipv6_netmask_length
  ipv6_cidr_block_network_border_group = var.ipv6_cidr_block_network_border_group

  instance_tenancy                     = var.instance_tenancy
  enable_dns_hostnames                 = var.enable_dns_hostnames
  enable_dns_support                   = var.enable_dns_support
  enable_network_address_usage_metrics = var.enable_network_address_usage_metrics

  tags = merge(
    { "Name" = var.name },
    var.tags,
    var.vpc_tags,
  )
}
